io.reinert.requestor.gwt.serialization

Class JsonValueSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.reinert.requestor.gwt.serialization.JsonSerializer<T>
      • io.reinert.requestor.gwt.serialization.JsonValueSerializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the object to serialize/deserialize
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deserializer<T>, Serializer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonBooleanSerializer, JsonNumberSerializer, JsonStringSerializer

    public abstract class JsonValueSerializer<T>
extends JsonSerializer<T>
    Base class for all Serializer that manipulates serialized JSON simple values.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        public <C extends Collection<T>> C deserialize(Class<C> collectionType,
                                               SerializedPayload payload,
                                               DeserializationContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Deserializer
        Deserialize the plain text into a collection T.

        The collection instance can be retrieved from DeserializationContext.getInstance(Class).
        Parameters:
        collectionType - The class of the collection
        payload - Http response body content
        context - Context of deserialization
        Returns:
        The object deserialized
